00021 #include "ConstSpeedMobility.h"
00022 
00023 #include <FWMath.h>
00024 
00025 
00026 Define_Module(ConstSpeedMobility);
00027 
00028 
00035 void ConstSpeedMobility::initialize(int stage)
00036 {
00037     BaseMobility::initialize(stage);
00038 
00039     if (stage == 0) {
00040         move.setSpeed(par("speed").doubleValue());
00041 
00042         if(move.getSpeed() <= 0)
00043           move.setSpeed(0);
00044 
00045     numSteps = 0;
00046     step = -1;
00047     stepSize = Coord(0,0,0);
00048 
00049     if (move.getSpeed() > 0) {
00050       debugEV << "Initialize: move speed: " << move.getSpeed() << " (" << par("speed").doubleValue() << ")"
00051               << " pos: " << move.info() << endl;
00052     }
00053     }
00054     else if( stage == 1 ){
00055       stepTarget = move.getStartPos();
00056     }
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00064 void ConstSpeedMobility::setTargetPosition()
00065 {
00066   debugEV << "start setTargetPosistion: " << move.info() << endl;
00067 
00068     do{
00069     targetPos = getRandomPosition();
00070 
00071     double distance = move.getStartPos().distance(targetPos);
00072     simtime_t totalTime = distance / move.getSpeed();
00073     numSteps = FWMath::round(totalTime / updateInterval);
00074 
00075     debugEV << "new targetPos: " << targetPos.info() << " distance=" << distance
00076        << " totalTime=" << totalTime << " numSteps=" << numSteps << endl;
00077     }
00078     while( numSteps == 0 );
00079 
00080     stepSize = targetPos - move.getStartPos();
00081 
00082     stepSize = stepSize / numSteps;
00083 
00084     stepTarget = move.getStartPos() + stepSize;
00085 
00086     debugEV << "stepSize: " << stepSize.info() << " target: " << (stepSize*numSteps).info() << endl;
00087 
00088     step = 0;
00089     move.setDirectionByTarget(targetPos);
00090 
00091     debugEV << "end setTargetPosistion: " << move.info() << endl;
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00099 void ConstSpeedMobility::makeMove()
00100 {
00101     // increment number of steps
00102     step++;
00103 
00104     if( step == numSteps ){
00105     // last step
00106     //stepSize.x =
00107     // step forward
00108     move.setStart(stepTarget, simTime());
00109 
00110     debugEV << "stepping forward. step #=" << step
00111        << " startPos: " << move.getStartPos().info() << endl;
00112 
00113 
00114     // get new target position
00115     debugEV << "destination reached.\n"
00116        << move.info() << endl;
00117     setTargetPosition();
00118     }
00119     else if( step < numSteps ){
00120     // step forward
00121     move.setStart(stepTarget, simTime());
00122     stepTarget += stepSize;
00123 
00124     debugEV << "stepping forward. step #=" << step
00125        << " startPos: " << move.getStartPos().info() << endl;
00126 
00127     }
00128     else{
00129       error("step cannot be bigger than numSteps");
00130     }
00131 
00132     //    fixIfHostGetsOutside();
00133 }
